notes.text: sap.m.Popover: Improve overflow handling when there is scrollable content
sap.m.ObjectNumber: adjust testing page
sap.m.PlanningCalendar and SinglePlanningCalendar: Adding the ability to repeat non-working periods
sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust accessibility semantics
We've now removed the no data description for cases where uploadEnabled is set to false
sap.m.MessageView: Correct group headers aria attributes and count
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: adjust internal title press handling
sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
sap.m.Toolbar: Keyboard arrow navigation added
sap.m.MessageView: Fix failing qUNit test
We've now introduced the fileSize parameter in fileSizeExceeded event of UploadSet
CellSelector: Allow selection with Row/RowOnly
sap.m.Link: adjust display in a form
sap.m.Dialog: Increase resize handle size
sap.m.Popover: Increase resize handle size
We now ensure that as per the guidelines the line-height on the linkTileContents has been set to 1.5rem
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Drag and drop in Hours view is now with 15 minutes minimum step
sap.m.Link: links with empty href attribute work correctly now
sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
sap.m.ObjectStatus: default alternative text is set for icon only statuses which icons can't be found in the Icon Registry
sap.m.Link: Add icon and endIcon functionality
sap.m.Page: Fix failing tests
sap.m.Popover: modal popover is not auto closed
sap.m.ObjectNumber: ARIA in empty mode is correct now
sap.m.IconTabBar: Text only filter line-height is fixed for Hindi
CellSelector: Shift + Click now extends the selection
sap.m.MessageView: Update details page on model update
sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added defaultClass to the items aggregation
We now ensure that the height of the Selection Details popover can be adjusted without the use of custom code
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when all-day appointments are selected with keyboard.
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Icon only status has a tooltip if the provided icon / image has default one
sap.m.Button: Accessible Improvement for Button test page
sap.m.MenuButton: Accessible Improvement for MenuButton test page
sap.m.SelectDialog,TableSelectDialog: Ensure that selection count is announced after title
We've now added space between attributes and the action buttons in the ActionTile
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust more link tab order
We've now updated the tab reading order for the FeedListItem control
sap.m.DateTimeInput: Remove an accessibility test page
